events.message: We have received the application from the candidate for the software engineer position in our backend team.
The application has been categorized under Engineering due to the candidate's experience in software development and backend services.
Recruiter John Smith has been assigned to manage this candidate's recruitment process for the software engineer vacancy.
Initial screening call completed; candidate demonstrated solid knowledge of backend programming and cloud architecture.
The candidate responded promptly to the interview scheduling request and expressed enthusiasm about the opportunity.
Technical interview with senior engineers has been scheduled for May 5th at 2 PM UTC for the backend developer role.
Candidate performed well in technical interview, successfully solving coding challenges and discussing system design.
HR interview scheduled to further discuss candidate's career goals, compensation expectations, and cultural fit.
HR interview completed; candidate showed alignment with company values and clear motivation for the engineering role.
An offer has been proposed to the candidate, including detailed terms about salary, benefits, and start date.
Candidate responded positively and asked a few clarifying questions regarding the benefits package and onboarding process.
Candidate officially accepted the offer and confirmed their starting date as June 1st, excited to join the engineering team.
Onboarding process has begun, including HR paperwork completion and introduction to team and company tools.
Recruitment for the software engineer position is now closed with the successful onboarding of the new hire.
